\def \articleABSTRACT{The input to a neuron can be categorized as driving or contextual. There are many ways to write formulations for contextual amplification. information theory can be used to study the different forms of information transmission. Here the original article on using three-way mutual and conditional mutual information to study contextual amplification is replicated and the Python code is made public.}
